players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Diana, be wary. I know your role & will watch you closely."
Diana: "Cooperate, Bob. Let's solve this together."
You: "Thanks Bob, let's work together. Diana, share your findings if you can."
Bob: "Diana, share your findings. Charlie's death is suspicious & I'm watching you."
Diana: "Collaborate, Bob. Share findings."
You: "Thanks for your trust, Bob. Diana, share any findings on Charlie's case."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana, be wary. I know your role & will watch you closely."
Diana: "Cooperate, Bob. Let's solve this together."
Alice: "Thanks Bob, let's work together. Diana, share your findings if you can."
You: "Diana, share your findings. Charlie's death is suspicious & I'm watching you."
Diana: "Collaborate, Bob. Share findings."
Alice: "Thanks for your trust, Bob. Diana, share any findings on Charlie's case."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested
